sentence.Network_en: The men had returned to wrest back power.
sentence.Network_cn: 这些人已经回来以图重新夺取权力。

sentence.Network_en: The officer managed to wrest the gun from his grasp.
sentence.Network_cn: 警官最终把枪从他手中夺走了.

sentence.Network_en: The rebels tried to wrest control of the town from government forces.
sentence.Network_cn: 反叛者企图从政府军手中夺取这个城镇的控制权.

" Heavy athletics " is the general name for wresting , boxing and weight - lifting ., " 重竞技项目 " 是摔跤 , 拳击和举重的总称.
拳击 boxing摔交 wresting击剑 fencing

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English wrǣstan 'twist, tighten', of Germanic origin; related to Danish vriste, also to wrist

entry.tran: (尤指艰难或非法地)攫取，抢夺
entry.def: If you wrest something from someone else, you take it from them, especially when this is difficult or illegal.

example.ex: For the past year he has been trying to wrest control from the central government...
example.tran: 一年来，他一直试图从中央政府手中将控制权夺过来。

example.ex: The men had returned to wrest back power.
example.tran: 这些人已经回来以图重新夺取权力。

entry.def: If you wrest something from someone who is holding it, you take it from them by pulling or twisting it violently.

example.ex: He wrested the suitcase from the chauffeur...
example.tran: 他从司机手里抢过手提箱。

example.ex: He was attacked by a security man who tried to wrest away a gas cartridge.
example.tran: 他遭到一名保安的袭击，那保安想抢走一个气瓶。

means.word_mean: 1. obtain by seizing forcibly or violently, also metaphorically;

sentences.sentence: "wrest a meaning from the old text"

auth_sentence.content: Government launches offensive to wrest control of Swat from militants.
auth_sentence.res_content: Government launches offensive to wrest control of Swat from militants.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Government launches offensive to wrest control of Swat from militants.

auth_sentence.content: In contrast, fattening bacteria wrest every last calorie from food.
auth_sentence.res_content: In contrast, fattening bacteria wrest every last calorie from food.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: In contrast, fattening bacteria wrest every last calorie from food.

auth_sentence.content: Analysts in the U.S. think that Apple will wrest the enterprise market from RIM.
